summary: The Period PROUD Act of 2025 aims to increase the availability of menstrual products for individuals with limited access. It provides targeted funding through the Social Services Block Grant program, allocating $200 million annually from 2026-2029 for states to distribute to eligible entities. These entities, including nonprofits, would provide free menstrual products, improve access, and offer related community outreach. The bill also includes provisions for an evaluation and guidance from the Secretary of Health and Human Services.
